channel.title: How to Change SERVER ip and Frame for client
channel.description:
Hi i'm trying to find out how to change the default server ip.. and the frame for the client
I looked in client.java and i couldn't find no default server ip what server trust me... I Then looked in the frame file and there is nothing in there that was on the frame; so i couldn't change..
Im currently using bluurs client..
Help is appriciated
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2009, 07:33:48 am[/size][hr]Ok i solved the server ip.. Now i just need the frame.. Although when i try getting on my server it logs me in and d'cs?
Can you help me solve that too thanks

item.title: How to Change SERVER ip and Frame for client
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

I done that still same thing happened… my mate told me that my right ints were wrong… could that be possible?

item.title: How to Change SERVER ip and Frame for client
item.dc:creator: @Tha_Hartpaint_Dude Tha Hartpaint Dude
item.description:
@Tha_Hartpaint_Dude wrote:

[quote=“Kalvin, post:3, topic:255067”]Every time i try to log in with the client it logs in
then d’cs and this is the error i get on my client

[code]Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection

[/code][/quote]

If you change the IP Some thinks will be changed. i mean If there is a packet that reads the normal ip and you changed it, then they don’t know what the hell your code is talking about.

So try to change everything. try in every class or map or .java Ctrl+f and typ the first ip. Oh yeah forgot something, then try to put it on your ip you want it. and if it is a client that you downloaded to just play and not supose to edit, there will be a Error Lock on it!

Greetz, Tha hartpaint team.

Read full topic
